original_text: and the wings of one touched the wings of another. Each one went straight ahead; they did not turn as they moved.
korean_text: 날개는 다 서로 연하였으며 갈 때에는 돌이키지 아니하고 일제히 앞으로 곧게 행하며

sentences.original_text: and the wings of one touched the wings of another
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 것의 날개가 다른 것의 날개에 닿았으며

sentences.original_text: they did not turn as they moved
